  • Method Details

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove​(Board board, Token c)
      This method will make a move for the NPC. It will take in the board object and token of the NPC as parameters and will use algorithms depending on the difficulty level of the NPC to make a move and place it's token on the board.
      Specified by:
      makeMove in interface IPlayerType
      Parameters:
      board - : the tic tac toe board
      c - : the token

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      eventType - General Object type
